name: Polarities (yanomono - Jan Karmański)
description:
Who wouldn't love to just detach their magnetic head and scale walls of a laboratory using conveniently placed magnets, right?

Use your head (literally) to make your way through a scientific facility, attracting yourself to and repelling from large magnets to zip through the air!


A game made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 with a theme "Joined Together".

Credits:
Coding: Jan Karmański, Nate Geschwill, Manuel Zambrano
Art: Partha Hukai, Feliks Milczarek
Music & SFX: Oscar Aldred
Fonts sourced from DaFonts.com
